Posts.Content: thanks for the kinds words x i am honestly fine with it i am even having a R.I.P Boobbq party weekend before i was expecting the diagnosis to be honest and as good at list making and researching stuff  as i am there are just a few little things that no amount of research can get and its those small tips and things that i think will make a difference to my recovery x so thank you for your pillow tip i'm going to get a v pillow tomorrow and my daughter has given me her nursing pillow as well so hopefully i can at least get a little comfy, Just a quick question if you don't mind how was your recovery and what was the most helpful thing anyone did that you thought i could have not managed without x
Posts.Title: diagnosed 2 days ago and having double mastectomy

Posts.Content: Hi i was diagnosed 2 days ago after the long long 10 day wait after mammogram ultrasound and biopsy all in 1 day after finding a lump in my left boobie.  So i am now having a double mastectomy "my choice" as there is a lot of cancer in my family dad son niece and so on i just wanted to know if there are any tips on surgery day or recovery at home that will come in handy just the small stuff really. many thanks x
